downloadTitle: Microsoft Threat Management Gateway Privacy Statement
downloadDescription: This document describes the privacy policy for Microsoft® Forefront Threat Management Gateway 2010
detailsSection: Microsoft is committed to protecting your privacy while delivering software and services that bring you the performance, power, and convenience you desire in your personal computing. This privacy statement explains many of the data collection and use practices of Forefront TMG v2.1 (“Forefront TMG”). It does not apply to other Microsoft Web sites, products, or services.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download, and then click Save.
2. Browse to the location you want to save the file to, and then click Save.
3. Browse to the location where you saved the file.
4. Double-click the file to open it.

relatedResourcesSection.title: forefront Threat Management Gateway 2010  Release Candidate
